testcase.name: US08_password_edit
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to Url.................................................passed And user clicks on Account menu.............................................passed And user clicks on Sign in button...........................................passed And user enters "team87user01" as username and "1234567" as password........passed And user clicks on the Signin button........................................passed And verify the login is successful..........................................passed And user clicks on account menu on the account page.........................passed Then user clicks on Password button.........................................passed

testcase.name: The new password should be confirmed
testcase.system-out: And user sends current password "1234567" to current password part..........passed And user sends new password "1234560" to new password part..................passed And user sends new password "1234560" again to new password confirmation part.passed And user clicks on save button..............................................passed And user verifies the success message on the toast container box............passed

testcase.name: for stronger password adding one LOWERCASE character
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "123456" to new password part...................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is one..........................passed And user add character " a" to new password part............................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is two..........................passed

testcase.name: for stronger password adding one UPPERCASE character
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "1234560" to new password part..................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is two..........................passed And user add character " C" to new password part............................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is four.........................passed

testcase.name: for stronger password adding one DIGIT character
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "qazwsX!" to new password part..................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is four.........................passed And user add character " 5" to new password part............................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is five.........................passed

testcase.name: for stronger password adding one SPECIAL character
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "12345xy" to new password part..................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is two..........................passed And user add character " !" to new password part............................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is four.........................passed

testcase.name: (Negative Scenario) sending 4 or 5 or 6 characters to verify that is not enough for a stronger password(There should be at least 7 characters)
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "qA1!" to new password part.....................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is one..........................passed

testcase.name: (Negative Scenario) sending 4 or 5 or 6 characters to verify that is not enough for a stronger password(There should be at least 7 characters) 2
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "qA1!5" to new password part....................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is one..........................passed

testcase.name: (Negative Scenario) sending 4 or 5 or 6 characters to verify that is not enough for a stronger password(There should be at least 7 characters) 3
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "qA1!5*" to new password part...................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is one..........................passed

testcase.name: (Positive Scenario) sending 6 then add 1 chars to see the password is getting stronger(There should be at least 7 characters)
testcase.system-out: And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user sends new password "12345x" to new password part...................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is one..........................passed And user add character " !" to new password part............................passed And user verifies the password strength bar is four.........................passed

testcase.name: old password should not be used
testcase.system-out: When user cleans the current password part..................................passed And user cleans the new password part.......................................passed And user cleans the confirmation password part..............................passed And user sends current password "1234560" to current password part..........passed And user sends current password "1234567" to new password part..............passed And user sends current password "1234567" to confirmation password part.....passed And user clicks on save button..............................................passed Then user sees the success message on the toast container box as a BUG......passed Then user close the driver..................................................passed
